meta.name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
meta.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

review.name: Easily one of the best films in the MCU
review.reviewBody:
This film really is something special.

I enjoyed every single second and would happily have lapped up hours more of it.

Everything about it is executed so well. I mean SO well.

Not a single Marvel fan alive will be disappointed by this.

meta.keywords: spider man character,superhero,marvel cinematic universe,multiverse,green goblin character

trailer.name: Trailer
trailer.description: With not one, not two, but THREE Spider-Mans!

description.value: With not one, not two, but THREE Spider-Mans!
We started getting visitors… from every universe. Watch the official trailer for #SpiderManNoWayHome, exclusively in movie theaters December 17.

plotText.plainText: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

text.plaidHtml: Benedict Cumberbatch admitted to not reading the full script, wanting to surprise himself with the final product.

(at around 13 mins) When Peter goes back to his high school and walks up the stairs, there is a mural behind him. Part of the mural contains a chemical structure, however, one of the carbons has five bonds. This is impossible as carbons cannot exceed four bonds.

lines.text: You may have dodged your legal troubles but things will get much worse. There's still the court of public opinion.

lines.stageDirection: Matt catches a brick thrown through the window

lines.text: How did you just do that?

text.plaidHtml: SPOILER: There is a scene in the closing credits: Eddie Brock and Venom from the Sony Pictures Universe of Marvel Characters are talking with a bartender. When the multiverse is restored, Brock and Venom are re-transported back to their universe, leaving a bit of symbiote behind.

An alternate version of the film (titled 'The More Fun Stuff Version') was announced by Sony Pictures in June 2022 and was later released in September 2nd of that year. This alternative version had some additional, extended scenes and a new post-credits scene (replace the teaser trailer of Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness (2022)) which weren't seen in the theatrical version of the film, taking the total runtime to 157 minutes. These new insertions include:
  • an introduction by Holland, Maguire, and Garfield
  • additional scenes of Parker and May being interrogated by the Department of Damage Control
  • the scene with Holland's brother Harry as a thief that was cut from the original release
  • additional scenes of Parker at school; Brant interviewing Parker, his teachers, and his classmates
  • Daily Bugle reports of Parker's first day back at school and the arrivals of Dillon and Marko
  • additional scenes in the basement of the New York Sanctum
  • a scene featuring May, Parker, and the villains in an elevator while on the way to Hogan's apartment
  • an additional scene with Murdock and Hogan
  • additional scenes of the three Parkers
  • new post-credits scene of showing how Peter Parker has been erased from history in a new edition of "Betty's Corner with Betty Brant" begins playing that recaps their high school years with all the footage and pictures missing Peter.
